1105ff73775ea22350333bd0198157de3d3e6483.query:
UPDATE characters
                SET
                    updated_at = $1,
                    stroke_count = $2,
                    version = $3
                WHERE
                    id = $4
                    AND
                    user_id = $5
                    AND
                    version = $6

5195cdc36c0b7dcf7a9e627ba1395ad3a7c8f1eb.query:
SELECT
                            id,
                            user_id,
                            character,
                            stroke_count,
                            created_at,
                            updated_at,
                            version
                        FROM
                            characters
                        WHERE
                            id = $1
                            AND user_id = $2

75747db0b40c202f2c7856c2558ef469ccd88178.query:
SELECT
                    id,

                    updated_at,
                    stroke_count,
                    version
                FROM
                    characters
                WHERE
                    id = $1
                    AND

8a37f98aa3cc0109da93fee934c74dfb30de8a02.query:
SELECT
                    id
                FROM
                    characters
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
                    AND
                    character = $2

a61d4c472eabb18f51d6b95448ce4688726dd8f2.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    character,
                    stroke_count,
                    created_at,
                    updated_at,
                    version
                FROM
                    characters
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
                    AND
                    ($2::VARCHAR(8)[] IS NULL OR character = Any($2))
                    AND
                    ($3::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id < $3)
                    AND
                    ($4::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id > $4)
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 0 THEN id END DESC,
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 1 THEN id END ASC
                LIMIT $6

d0c6008b973288959df3bd88a441ad79205aefce.query:
INSERT INTO characters (id, user_id, character, created_at)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

d2ca950c76d88c1144c4dd4c2797da49a428d5c5.query:
INSERT INTO records (id, user_id, character, figure, created_at, stroke_count)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

eff5439728f450981f63d8b223f34c0bec7331fa.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    character,
                    figure,
                    created_at,
                    stroke_count
                FROM
                    records
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
                    AND
                    ($2::VARCHAR(8)[] IS NULL OR character = Any($2))
                    AND
                    ($3::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id < $3)
                    AND
                    ($4::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id > $4)
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 0 THEN id END DESC,
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 1 THEN id END ASC
                LIMIT $6

                            id,
